page.title: 15ARTS & CRAFTS-LOCAL ARTIST
page.content: Roger Heaton is a well-known animal artist, who works in a converted barn in Barton-in-Fabis.There is a gallery on the ground floor,where there is a wide variety of paintings on display and upstairs is the studio where he paints.He has now been painting full- time for eight years after training at Nottingham Art College and Hornsea College in North London.He works in both oils and watercolours and states that he does not have a preference between them.His watercolour paintings and pastel drawings take between four and six weeks to complete whilst his oil paintings take much longer.The price of his work varies considerably. If several animals appear in a portrait the cost is greater.He likes to paint cats because they are so unpredictable and he prefers to paint them at play.
